definition: to feel sad/to feel unwell/(of life) to be difficult
difficult (to...)/problem/difficulty/difficult/not good
disaster/distress/to scold
(experienced action marker)
surname Guo
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
even heroes have a weakness for the charms of a beautiful woman (idiom)
pinyin: ying1 xiong2 nan2 guo4 mei3 ren2 guan1

definition: to meet with great difficulties but pull through
pinyin: guan1 guan1 nan2 guo4 , guan1 guan1 guo4

sentences.english: You don't have to do something to make me feel so sad.
sentences.chinese: 你不一定要做錯什麼事情才讓我如此傷心難過。

sentences.english: Firn is too big, the person that winds some is very sad without ticket.
sentences.chinese: 積雪太大，回有的的人沒有車票好難過。

sentences.english: But the damage is done now. Saying sorry won’t mend anything.
sentences.chinese: 但木已成舟，說難過也於事無補了。

sentences.english: This is a frightful moment in our life.
sentences.chinese: 這是我們一生之中的一個非常難過的時刻。

sentences.english: Don’t panic, I’m talking about just 15 minutes per day when your notebook reigns.
sentences.chinese: 別難過，我說的是每天用15分鐘讓筆記本做主。

sentences.english: To conceal this moment with a radian already a wrinkled face sad.
sentences.chinese: 一抹弧度來掩飾此刻已皺起的一臉難過。

sentences.english: If you're feeling down or upset, let your friends and family members support you.
sentences.chinese: 如果你感覺沮喪難過，讓你的朋友和家裏人支持你。

sentences.english: Don’t get me wrong, I’m sad about the demise of print, too.
sentences.chinese: 別誤會我的意思，對於印刷品的消亡我也很難過。

sentences.english: I'm sorry if I bothered you, I'm just so sad.
sentences.chinese: 很抱歉打擾你了，我真的好難過。

sentences.english: Regardless of being happy or sad, my love has been invariable.
sentences.chinese: 無論是開心還是難過，我的愛一直不變。

sentences.english: What hurts me is that he always misunderstands me.
sentences.chinese: 使我難過得是他總是誤解我。

sentences.english: In the beginning, everyone felt sorry for him.
sentences.chinese: 在開始的時候，每個人都爲他感到難過。

sentences.english: B: Oh, How terrible for Tom. I’m so sorry.
sentences.chinese: 噢，湯姆命太苦了，我真難過。

sentences.english: I can explain. If you are a late-born Pisces, don't be blue.
sentences.chinese: 我可以解釋，如果你是這些晚生的雙魚兒，不要難過。

sentences.english: Glendinning had covered his face with his hands and everyone clearly felt very sorry for him .
sentences.chinese: 格蘭丁尼用雙手捂着臉，大家顯然都爲他感到難過。
